sen.j: 巻名は、薫と弁の尼が詠み交わした和歌「やどりきと思ひ出でずは 木のもとの旅寝もいかにさびしからまし」「荒れ果つる朽木のもとをやどりきと思ひおきけるほどのかなしさ」に因む。
sen.e: The title was taken from waka which Kaoru and Ben no Ama exchanged: "Yadorikito omoiidezuha kinomotono tabinemoikani sabisikaramashi (If I don't remember that I have once stayed, how sleep in journey would make me feel lonely)" and "Arehaturu kuchikinomotowo yadorikito omoiokekeru hodonokanashisa (It is sad to consider delapidated place under rotten wood as place in which once stayed)."

The title was taken from waka which Kaoru and Ben no Ama exchanged: "Yadorikito omoiidezuha kinomotono tabinemoikani sabisikaramashi (If I don't remember that I have once stayed, how sleep in journey would make me feel lonely)" and "Arehaturu kuchikinomotowo yadorikito omoiokekeru hodonokanashisa (It is sad to consider delapidated place under rotten wood as place in which once stayed)."

sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。sabishiとしました。

sen.e: "Yadoriki" here is Kakekotoba (one of waka's oratories) between another name of ivy (Yadorigi) and "yadoriki (once stayed)".
"Yadoriki" here is kakekotoba (pun) on "yadorigi" (another name for ivy) and "yadoriki" (once stayed).
sen.cmt: Added different explanation of "kakekotoba". "Between"-"on". Added English translation in parentheses.
sen.e: Yadoriki' here is kakekotoba (pun) on words both 'yadorigi' (another name for ivy) and 'yadoriki' (once stayed).

sen.e: Kinjo no Mikado (present emperor) (Genji Monogatari) told Kaoru that he want to get Kaoru to look after Onnaninimiya who lost her mother, who was a nyogo, and had no guardian, and Kaoru, who could not forget late Oigimi, reluctantly agreed to it.

sen.j: 気のすすまぬまま夕霧の婿となった匂宮だが、六の君の美しさのとりこになり、中の君には次第に夜離れ（よがれ）が多くなる。
sen.e: Nioumiya, who became Yugiri's son-in-law reluctantly, became enslaved by Rokunomiya's beauty and yogare (a man discontinues to visit a women) to Naka no Kimi increased.
